mapper.select: SELECT A.CARLINE_CD, FN_GET_CARLINE_NM(A.CARLINE_CD) AS CARLINE_NM, FN_GET_CARLINE_NM_NC(A.CARLINE_CD) AS CARLINE_NM_NC, A.CARLINE_EN_NM FROM SA_0101T A WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT + 1 GROUP BY A.CARLINE_CD, A.CARLINE_NM, A.CARLINE_EN_NM ORDER BY A.CARLINE_CD, A.CARLINE_NM

SELECT DECODE(B.FSCP_CHM_MMM, '', 'N/A', B.FSCP_CHM_MMM) AS FSC_NM, DECODE(B.FSCP_MODTP_CD, '', 'None', B.FSCP_MODTP_CD) AS FSC_CD FROM SA_0102T A, SA_0105T B WHERE A.MODEL_CD = B.MODEL_CD AND SUBSTR(A.MODEL_CD, 1, 2) = #{sCarlineCd} GROUP BY B.FSCP_CHM_MMM, B.FSCP_MODTP_CD ORDER BY B.FSCP_CHM_MMM ASC NULLS FIRST

SELECT A.EXT_COLOR_CD, FN_GET_EXT_COLOR_NM(A.EXT_COLOR_CD) AS EXT_COLOR_NM, FN_GET_EXT_COLOR_NM_NC(A.EXT_COLOR_CD) AS EXT_COLOR_NM_NC, B.EXT_COLOR_EN_NM FROM SA_0109T A, SA_0107T B WHERE A.EXT_COLOR_CD = B.EXT_COLOR_CD AND A.MODEL_CD = #{sModelCd} GROUP BY A.EXT_COLOR_CD, B.EXT_COLOR_NM, B.EXT_COLOR_EN_NM ORDER BY A.EXT_COLOR_CD, B.EXT_COLOR_NM

SELECT A.INT_COLOR_CD, FN_GET_INT_COLOR_NM(A.INT_COLOR_CD) AS INT_COLOR_NM, FN_GET_INT_COLOR_NM_NC(A.INT_COLOR_CD) AS INT_COLOR_NM_NC, B.INT_COLOR_EN_NM FROM SA_0109T A, SA_0108T B WHERE A.INT_COLOR_CD = B.INT_COLOR_CD AND A.MODEL_CD = #{sModelCd} GROUP BY A.INT_COLOR_CD, B.INT_COLOR_NM, B.INT_COLOR_EN_NM ORDER BY A.INT_COLOR_CD, B.INT_COLOR_NM
